item.title: Graduate School
item.description: I’m a graduate student at Northeastern University and part of the ALIGN program pursuing a master’s degree in Computer Science. The ALIGN program consists of a series of bridge courses for graduate students that didn’t major in Computer Science in their undergraduate studies. Upon completion of the ALIGN program students begin taking graduate level classes in computer science. I’m currently taking CS5002 - Discrete and Data Structures. From the Northeastern University course description catalog:
